column4: i want to forward my port for vnc , I have a Modem/Router and Router, do i need to forward from MODEM/ROUTER to ROUTER then from Router to PC, or from Modem/Router to pc, and from Router the same to pc ?
whatever serial path the network follows. sounds like router/modem -> router -> pc
both sides of the middle router can't have the same subnet.  so more like:  ---> ISP IP <router/modem> 10.0.0.2 -----> <router> ----> 10.0.1.2 <pc>
